tool_description: Basic information on all weed strains. Build mobile apps for weed strains.

api_list.name: All Strains - Descending
api_list.description: List of all strains ordered by name in descending order.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Specifies the order of the strain list.

api_list.name: All Strains - Ascending
api_list.description: List of all strains ordered by name in ascending order.

required_parameters.name: ordering
required_parameters.description: Specifies the order of the strain list.

api_list.name: Difficulty
api_list.description: Provides results of all strains by their difficulty of growing, such as easy, medium, or difficult.

required_parameters.name: difficulty
required_parameters.description: Specifies the difficulty level of growing the strain.

api_list.name: Strain Type
api_list.description: Provides a list of results by strain type such as Indica, Sativa, Hybrid, etc.

required_parameters.name: strainType
required_parameters.description: Specifies the type of strain to filter results.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Provides a list of results based on a search keyword.

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: The keyword to search for specific strains.

api_list.name: Single Strain
api_list.description: Provides all details for a single strain by its ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the strain.

api_list.name: All Strains
api_list.description: Provides a list of all available strains.
